author: Matthias Lataille
description: One orange liqueur, blue curacao, replaces another, triple sec, to give this Sidecar an aquamarine hue.
name: Sidecar No. Blue
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
